summary: Ulisse is a naive young man out looking for a job after being released from the army. He drops the offer he gets from a group of fascists to go in with the Fossatis, a family of anarchists (unknown to him).
cast: Alain Delon|Barbara Lass|Gino Cervi|Rina Morelli|Carlo Pisacane|Paolo Stoppa|Giampiero Littera|Didi Perego|Ugo Tognazzi|Aroldo Tieri|Luigi Giuliani|Jacques Stany|Stefano Valle|Annibale Ninchi|Leopoldo Trieste|Nanda Primavera|Nando Bruno|Enzo Maggio|Franco Speziali|Gastone Moschin|Graziella Durano|Rosalba Neri|Luciano Bonanni|René Clément|Fanfulla|Paolo Giusti|Robert Hundar|Renato Malavasi|Michele Riccardini|Donatella Turri|Monica Neri
title: Que alegría vivir
